snippet: Nascar temporarily suspended driver A J Allmendinger for a failed drug test, and Penske Racing officials scrambled to get Sam Hornish Jr. to the track before Saturday night’s Sprint Cup race at Daytona.
abstract: Nascar temporarily suspends driver A J Allmendinger for a failed drug test.
lead_paragraph: Nascar temporarily suspended driver A J Allmendinger for a failed drug test, and Penske Racing officials scrambled to get Sam Hornish Jr. to the track before Saturday night’s Sprint Cup race at Daytona.

headline.seo: Nascar Suspends Allmendinger for Failed Drug Test
headline.main: Nascar Suspends Allmendinger for Failed Drug Test
